page.title: 15The Young Farmers Club.
page.content: The{Young Farmers club}consists mostly of{young people who live on farms. Every year we have a{competition of {drama and singing.}This year it was comedy and we did the evacuation of 1943.We had lots of{rehearsals}and then finally it was into Totnes for the first stage of the competition.We got through that,coming first,so it was on to the next round.After that we {performed at the Festival Theatre in {Paignton}where we came last! The young farmers don't only have drama competitions.We have{sheep {shearing classes,barbecues,barn dances {and ram roasts.We also learn how to {look after animals. It is really good fun being in the Young Farmers Club because you've got the chance to learn{public speaking and lots of other activities. Diane Nicholls.
